text.name: info4
text.text: Memory: 64 KB main RAM and 64 KB video RAM

text.name: info6
text.text: Sound: Yamaha YM2612, Texas Instruments SN76489A

text.name: info9
text.text: The Sega Mega Drive/Genesis is Sega's third home console. It was

text.name: info10
text.text: codenamed the Sega Mark V during development and is part of what is

text.name: info11
text.text: now known as the fourth generation of video game consoles.
